contractObjectiveList.title: Engage and destroy all Directorate units

objectiveList.title: Stop the Second Transport from Escaping

dialogueContent.words: Welcome to Smithon, Commander. The bulk of our army is entrenched in the capital, exchanging fire with what's left of the Directorate's defense force. The battle is leaning in our favor, but we're running low on ammunition. This is where you come in.

The structure before you is a munitions dump that the Directorate stole from House Karosas. I need you to take it back. Find all hostile units and eliminate them; our combat support staff will handle the rest.

When you enter the facility, you'll find plenty of munitions crates that have already been packaged for transport. Be advised that these are volatile and highly explosive. Use them strategically if you must; otherwise, the Restoration will pay you a bonus for any crates that make it through the battle intact.
One last thing. We've got eyes on Directorate transport vehicles in the area. It's a safe bet that they're here for those munitions as well, so be ready to stop them.
Good job, Commander. With the supplies you've just secured for us, our BattleMechs will shatter the Directorate's battle lines. Smithon will be liberated, now and forever.
And Lord Karosas will be grateful. Not to put too fine a point on it, but we do need his help.
And we shall have it. I'll arrange an audience with him directly. Enjoy your victory, Commander—you've earned it.
Good hunting, Commander. Take out those BattleMechs, and mind the crates.
All hands on deck! We are under attack! This is not a drill!
That's half of their fighting units down! Keep this up and the facility is ours!
There's only one of them left! Take it out and this facility is ours!
Some losses were to be expected, but we need as many of those crates as you can recover. Try to salvage what's left.
We've already lost most of the munitions crates—what's left won't make much difference one way or the other. Ignore the crates and focus on the enemy.
That supply truck is running with a full load of ammunition! Don’t let it escape!
Another supply truck is fully loaded and moving out! Destroy it before it gets away!
